about.title: About
about.description: Software engineer with experience in backend and frontend development, specializing in crafting scalable, secure frameworks since 2016. Skilled in PHP, NodeJS, Go. I excel in collaborative environments, driving projects from concept to deployment, and am committed to continuous learning and delivering impactful solutions.

loopio.description: Developing new features and implementing enhancements tailored to enterprise clients, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance. Collaborating cross-functionally to deliver solutions that address complex business requirements and improve customer satisfaction. Contributing to maintaining and optimizing backend systems to support enterprise-level use cases.
loopio.tech: Symfony, PHP 8, TypeScript, ReactJs, MySQL, PHPUnit, TDD, Redis, Docker, Code Review, AWS

netcoins.description: Key contributions include developing and refining features such as Staking and KYC, refactoring legacy code, and collaborating with the Product Manager on requirements and user stories. Led the adoption of automated testing, which notably reduced QA issues and fostered a testing culture.
netcoins.tech: Laravel, PHP 8, TypeScript, VueJs, MySQL, PHPUnit, TDD, Redis, Docker, Code Review, AWS

m56.description: Developed and maintained features for Fit52, including creating REST API endpoints with PHP 8.1, Laravel 9, Redis, and MySQL, and managed integrations with Shopify, Stripe, Segment, and RevenueCat.

leroy.description: Developed integrations with external services like Google Merchant Center, Facebook Business, and BigQuery using PHP and Laravel. Utilized our open-source library, Metamorphosis, for Apache Kafka interactions. GoLang was employed for efficient data transmission. Also constructed REST APIs for the e-commerce platform with thorough test coverage and improved platform observability using tools like Grafana, Datadog, and Confluent Conduktor.
leroy.tech: Laravel, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Kafka, PHPUnit, TDD, Open Source, Mentorship, DataDog, Grafana, Docker, Redis, Code Review, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Go, AWS

masp.company: Museu de Arte de São Paulo – MASP
masp.description: Developed administrative tools to boost productivity and process control, and enhanced the museum visitor experience with interactive kiosks, using PHP, Laravel, NodeJS, VueJs, ReactJs, and Bootstrap, deployed on Azure.
masp.tech: Laravel, PostgreSQL, Azure, VueJS, React, NodeJS, Web Sockets, API Integrations

dvm.description: Developed static and dynamic websites using jQuery, JavaScript, CSS, Bootstrap, HTML, PHP 5.6, 7.*, NodeJs and MySQL.
dvm.tech: PHP 5.6/7, MySQL, jQuery, JavaScript, CSS, HTML

degree.institution: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Triângulo Mineiro
